scripts.build: npm run typecheck && npx esbuild Ai.Tlbx.MidTerm/src/ts/main.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap=external --outfile=Ai.Tlbx.MidTerm/wwwroot/js/terminal.min.js --target=es2020
scripts.build:dev: npm run typecheck && npx esbuild Ai.Tlbx.MidTerm/src/ts/main.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap=external --outfile=Ai.Tlbx.MidTerm/wwwroot/js/terminal.min.js --target=es2020
